General.Name: Samindo Resources Tbk
General.Description: PT Samindo Resources Tbk, through its subsidiaries, provides coal and other mining services primarily in Indonesia. It offers overburden removal and coal getting, coal hauling, and drilling exploration and other services segments. The company was formerly known as PT Myoh Technology Tbk and changed its name to PT Samindo Resources Tbk in February 2012. PT Samindo Resources Tbk was founded in 2000 and is based in Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia. PT Samindo Resources Tbk is a subsidiary of ST International Corporation
General.Address: EQUITY TOWER, Unit CDH, Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia, 12190
